urls.title: KLM A Letter From Boris
urls.description: Christmas! A time of giving. And where we normally work hard to hang on to all our airplane parts..we made an exception for Boris. Just this once.Dutch and E...

data.text: Almost 4 years ago we received a letter from 10-year-old Boris, who was building his own wooden KLM aircraft in his backyard in Finland. And now, four years later, it was time for him to finally meet the team who helped him acquire those final missing parts.#KLM #ALetterFromBoris https://t.co/ruQbH21rDY

urls.title: Let's celebrate cultural diversity!
urls.description: On the World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development we celebrate the richness of the world's cultures. At KLM we want everyone to have the freedom to be themselves and to feel safe and valued in the workplace. We'd like to give the floor to our staff as they share what diversity means to them!

data.text:
Today is the World Day for Cultural Diversity. A day to celebrate the richness of the world’s cultures. Discover what diversity means to our staff: https://t.co/jExT7KkefI. 
#KLM #DiversityDay #culturaldiversity #KLMConnectingColours https://t.co/RxyUCdgZIl
